title: Crunchy Romaine Toss Recipe Read Reviews (2) Be the first to add a review 5 2 3
directions: In a jar with a tight-fitting lid, combine the sugar, oil, vinegar, soy sauce, salt and pepper; shake well. Discard seasoning packet from noodles or save for another use. In a skillet, saute noodles in butter until golden. In a large bowl, combine noodles, broccoli, romaine and onions. Just before serving, toss with dressing and walnuts. Yield: 6-8 servings.
